item.title: Base64
item.description: Base64 Encoder / Decoder Encode Base64 # # From text $ zuk "Hello world!" to base64 # From pipe $ zuk base64 < data.txt Decode Base64 # $ zuk SGVsbG8gd29ybGQh Too short text may not be recognized as a Base64 input.

item.title: Calc
item.description: Simple Calculator Integer Arithmetic # $ zuk (1 + 2 + 3 + 4) * 5 Decimal Arithmetic # $ zuk 2900401.23365 * 6316714975174469.1697205940

item.title: Color
item.description: Color Converter Convert CSS Color Notation # $ zuk \#ff00ff $ zuk rgb(100, 200, 150) $ zuk rgb(100, 200, 150, .4) $ zuk hsl(150 50% 10%)

item.title: Dice
item.description: Dice Roller Roll a die # $ zuk roll dice $ zuk ðŸŽ² Roll three dice # $ zuk roll 3 dice Dice Notation # $ zuk 2d10 $ zuk (2d6 + 4d100) * 2

item.title: Digest
item.description: Digest calculator Calcurate MD5 and SHA-1 # # From text $ zuk "Hello world!" to md5 sha1 # From pipe $ zuk md5 sha1 < data.txt Supported Algorithms # Algorithm Keys MD5 md5 SHA-1 sha1 sha-1 SHA-224 sha-224 sha224 sha2 sha-2 SHA-256 sha-256 sha256 sha2 sha-2 SHA-384 sha-384 sha384 sha2 sha-2 SHA-512 sha-512 sha512 sha2 sha-2 SHA-512/224 sha-512/224 sha512-224 sha2 sha-2 SHA-512/256 sha-512/256 sha512-256 sha2 sha-2 SHA-3-224 sha3-224 sha3 sha-3 SHA-3-256 sha3-256 sha3 sha-3 SHA-3-384 sha3-384 sha3 sha-3 SHA-3-512 sha3-512 sha3 sha-3 Keccak-224 keccak-224 sha3 sha-3 Keccak-256 keccak-256 sha3 sha-3 Keccak-384 keccak-384 sha3 sha-3 Keccak-512 keccak-512 sha3 sha-3 CRC-32/ISO-HDLC crc32 crc-32 crc32-iso crc-32-iso crc-32-iso-hdlc crc-32/iso-hdlc crc32/iso-hdlc crc32/iso BLAKE2-S-256 blake2s256 blake2 BLAKE2-B-512 blake2b512 blake2 BLAKE3 blake3

item.title: Geo
item.description: Geological Utilities Decode Open Location Code # $ zuk 6PH57VP3+PR

item.title: Lipsum
item.description: Dummy Text Generator Generate Text # Generates 30 words lorem ipsum by default. $ zuk generate lipsum $ zuk lorem ipsum $ zuk dummy text Generate Text with Word Count # $ zuk generate 200 words lipsum $ zuk 200 words lorem ipsum $ zuk dummy text 200 words

item.title: NanoID
item.description: NanoID Generator Generate a NanoID # $ zuk nanoid Generate 5 NanoIDs # $ zuk generate 5 nanoid

item.title: Prime
item.description: Prime Number Tester Test Primality # $ zuk Is 34534321 a prime number? $ zuk is 37975227936943673922808872755445627854565536638199 prime? If a given integer is larger than \(2^{32}-1\) , its primality will be checked by the Millerâ€“Rabin primality test and the result could be a false-positive.

item.title: Punycode
item.description: Punycode Encoder / Decoder Encode # This skill detects domain names with non-ASCII characters and encodes them into punycode. Domain names must end with TLD listed in https://www.iana.org/domains/root/db. $ zuk ðŸŒµðŸŒµðŸŒµ.com Decode # An input string must start with xn--. $ zuk xn--3o8h

item.title: Unit
item.description: Unit Converter Convert Length # # Length $ zuk 2000ft # Weight $ zuk 100lb # Storage Size $ zuk 20.5MiB Supported Units # Type Units Length m nm Âµm mm km in yd ft mi. item.title: UUID
item.description: UUID Generator Generate a UUID # $ zuk uuid Generate 5 UUIDs # $ zuk generate 5 uuid
